org.cmg.resp.behaviour
Interface AgentContext

public interface AgentContext

Identifies a generic context are an agent is executed. A context provides the mean used by agents to perform SCEL actions.

Author:
Michele Loreti

Method Summary

            Tuple t,
            Target l)
